data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (status IS NULL OR status = 'green')) AS 'Health Score' FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine FACET vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine_name
SELECT uniqueCount(vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine_name) AS 'Virtual Machines' FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine FACET cluster_name

presentation.title: Cluster Name Distribution
presentation.notes: The Cluster Name of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine_name) AS 'Virtual Machines' FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine FACET datacenter_name

presentation.title: Datacenter Name Distribution
presentation.notes: The Datacenter of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine_name) AS 'Virtual Machines' FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine FACET host_name

presentation.title: Host Name Distribution
presentation.notes: The Host System Name of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_used) FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Used (Percent)
presentation.notes: The CPU Used of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_space_used) FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Space Used (Percent)
presentation.notes: The Disk Space Used of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_read_latency) FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Read Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The Disk Read Latency of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_write_latency) FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Write Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The Disk Write Latency of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_throughput) FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Throughput (Kilobytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The Disk Throughput Counter of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(network_throughput) FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Network Throughput (Kilobytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The Network Throughput Counter of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(memory_used) FROM vmware_vcenter_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Memory Used (Percent)
presentation.notes: The Memory Used of the Virtual Machine.
